languages.text: "Ты выглядишь так, словно вот-вот умрешь. Что бы эта штука не делала с тобой — долго ты не протянешь".
"You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."
languages.original_text: "Ты выглядишь так, словно вот-вот умрешь. Что бы эта штука не делала с тобой — долго ты не протянешь".

traits.locale_text: "You look like you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."
"You look like you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."
"You look like you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."
"You look like you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."
"You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."
"You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."

languages.text: 「あなたは今にも死んでしまいそうだ。あいつらが何をしているかは知らないが、そう長くは持ちこたえられないだろう」
languages.original_text: "You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは今にも死んでしまいそうだ。あいつらが何をしているかは知らないが、そう長くは持ちこたえられないだろう」

languages.text: “你看起来快要没命了。虽然不知道那台装置是怎么影响你的，但这样下去，你恐怕挺不了多久。”
languages.original_text: "You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."

traits.locale_text: “你看起来命不久矣。虽然不知道那台装置是怎么影响你的，但这样下去，你恐怕活不了多久。”

languages.text: «Parece que está a punto de morir. No sé qué le está haciendo esa cosa, pero no durará mucho».
languages.original_text: "You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."

traits.locale_text: «Parece que está a punto de morir. No sé qué le está haciendo esa cosa, pero no durará mucho».

languages.text: "Ihr seht aus, als würdet Ihr bald sterben. Was auch immer Euch dieses Ding antut, Ihr werdet es nicht lange überleben."
languages.original_text: "You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seht aus, als würdet Ihr bald sterben. Was das Ding Euch auch antut, Ihr werdet es nicht lange überleben."

languages.text: « Vous avez l'air à deux doigts de rendre l'âme. Quoi que cette chose vous fasse, vous ne tiendrez pas longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez l'air à deux doigts de rendre l'âme. Quoi que cette chose vous fasse, vous ne tiendrez pas longtemps. »

languages.text: "Bir ayağın çukurda gibi duruyorsun. Şu şeyin üzerindeki etkisi her ne olursa olsun uzun bir ömür süremeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "You look as if you are about to die. Whatever that thing is doing to you, you will not last long."

traits.locale_text: "Bir ayağın çukurda gibi duruyorsun. Şu şeyin üzerindeki etkisi her ne olursa olsun ömrün uzun olmayacak."
